channel.title: SMF Glitch
channel.description:
I have recently noticed that if I make a post and then someone that is moderated makes a post, it says my I made the last post when it was not mYe.
exapmple: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,395293.0.html
[img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=dlattach;topic=395389.0;attach=16822;image[/img]
[img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=dlattach;topic=395389.0;attach=16824;image[/img]

item.title: SMF Glitch
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“Elijah, post:15, topic:299035”][quote author=pk3r john link=topic=395389.msg2948526#msg2948526 date=1252349227]

I would like SMF 2 to be released first, I might upgrade to it while it is still in beta, but I doubt it.

Does that mean our accounts will get reset?
[/quote]

No it doesn’t. The MySQL tables will be converted to 2.0[/quote]

That is correct. I’ll run a test first and backup so we are sure not to lose anything.

Read full topic

item.title: SMF Glitch
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

[quote=“pk3r john, post:14, topic:299035”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=395389.msg2938140#msg2938140 date=1251682802]
I would like SMF 2 to be released first, I might upgrade to it while it is still in beta, but I doubt it.
[/quote]

Does that mean our accounts will get reset? :|[/quote]

No it doesn’t. The MySQL tables will be converted to 2.0

Read full topic

item.title: SMF Glitch
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

[quote=“Bowser jr, post:9, topic:299035”][quote author=atrox_ link=topic=395389.msg2937745#msg2937745 date=1251660143]

That would be the extremely shitty visual warning system currently installed. We only have to live with it a few more weeks/months.

Yep, until I upgrade to SMF 2.

and that will be when?
[/quote]
When it is stable and MITB think is it secure to use.[/quote]

More like when he gets some time.

Read full topic
